allow: Bash("D:/SDK/Android/platform-tools/adb.exe" -s emulator-5554 shell pm grant com.joy.bexly android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS)

Bash("D:/SDK/Android/platform-tools/adb.exe" -s emulator-5554 shell "run-as com.joy.bexly sqlite3 databases/bexly_database.db ''SELECT id, title, body, type, datetime(scheduledFor/1000, ""unixepoch"") as scheduledTime FROM notifications ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;''")

Bash("D:/SDK/Android/platform-tools/adb.exe" -s emulator-5554 shell "run-as com.joy.bexly sqlite3 databases/bexly_database.db ''SELECT id, name, nextDueDate, frequency, autoCreate, status, lastChargedDate FROM recurrings;''")

Bash("D:/SDK/Android/platform-tools/adb.exe" -s emulator-5554 shell "run-as com.joy.bexly sqlite3 databases/bexly_database.db ''SELECT id, title, amount, walletId, transactionType, categoryId, strftime(""%Y-%m-%d"", date/1000, ""unixepoch"") as txDate FROM transactions WHERE strftime(""%Y-%m"", date/1000, ""unixepoch"") = ""2025-11"";''")
